text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Type
ROW.tagdesc: The nature or genre of the resource.

ROW.title: Date Modified
ROW.tagdesc: Date on which the resource was changed.

ROW.title: License
ROW.tagdesc: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

ROW.title: Rights Holder
ROW.tagdesc: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

ROW.title: Access Rights
ROW.tagdesc: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

ROW.title: Bibliographic Citation
ROW.tagdesc: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

ROW.title: References
ROW.tagdesc: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.

ROW.title: Location
ROW.tagdesc: *Main structure* containing Darwin Core location based information.
